Malice/ Organics/ Wolfblade:
 
Malice looked dumbly around.  His little temper tantrum expended most of his energy.  He could tell Blacknightmare was in pain, and he had to do something for her.  He opened his chest panel and ran a tube to an access point on Blacknightmare.
"We... will... share the burden," he said, leeching the cybervenom from her.  Maybe his body could process the venom to make it less potent.
 
Organics remained in stasis lock, but her subconscious  kept wondeing why, why Malice beat her?  Why?
 
Wolfblade ran back to Malice, and was shocked.  Malice was help the minion.  She fell to he knees and sat in shock.  her rifle fell to one side, her head hung low.
"What's going on?  Why is he helping her?  What is going on here!" she demanded, tears beginning to form in the corners of her optics.
